name: Tokoloshe (Tikoloshe)
shortLoreBlurb: Tokoloshe (Tikoloshe) is a spirit from Zulu/Xhosa associated with mischief, night. Trickster tales teach caution and wit.
overlapsLinks: Anansi (Akan), Chandra (Hindu), Chang'e (China), Coyote (Native American), Hermes (Greek), Loki (Norse), Mama Quilla (Inca), Tsukuyomi (Japan)
description: Tokoloshe (Tikoloshe) is a spirit from Zulu/Xhosa associated with mischief, night. Trickster tales teach caution and wit.
